item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hey everyone! So it's probably been a while since you've heard from me because I dropped off of facebook and started interacting way less with social media. For many people reading this we probably haven't talked since I was in college. Even if we have, it probably hasn't been as …
item.dc:creator: putz

item.title: Update - added music section
item.description: After a day of putting it all together, I've finally got the music section in a workable state! I'm still not 100% finished with it, I'd like to add some descriptions for each song individually and see if there's a way to make the music player play through the whole …
item.dc:creator: putz

item.title: Website launch
item.description:
Well hello there! I'm starting a website because I want to have a place where people can stay in touch with me and see what I'm up to.

I just recently switched to pelican to run things because it offers more powerful tools for running a blog than zim-wiki, which …
item.dc:creator: putz

item.title: Updates
item.description:
Been working on the stylesheet all night and I think it's in a place where the experience should hopefully be a little better finally, especially for mobile.

Basically the only thing I have to do now is set up a system for making posts (or just learning Markdown and type …
